titleInfo.title: Gospel Singing with Oak Ridge Boys, Kingsmen, and More at Salem-Roanoke Valley Civic Center (17169)

mods.abstract: Two color window card (blue on yellow) announcing Gospel Singing with Oak Ridge Boys, Kingsmen, BLue Ridge Quartet, Florida Boys, LeFevres, Dixie Melody Boys, and the Singing Americans at the Salem-Roanoke Valley Civic Center on December 27. To see the business record associated with this poster, visit https://digi.countrymusichalloffame.org/digital/collection/hatch3/id/42957/
